State Highway 2 closed after Waipawa crash, at least one person seriously injured https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/state-highway-2-close-after-waipawa-crash-at-least-one-person-seriously-injured/G3YY7FMEDNEVRDZ6SIZXUM65KE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/state-highway-2-close-after-waipawa-crash-at-least-one-person-seriously-injured/G3YY7FMEDNEVRDZ6SIZXUM65KE/ The NZTA said SH2 was closed near the intersection with Collins St, Waipawa. Sat, 04 May 2024 02:04:42 +0000 A police spokesman said emergency services were responding to the two-car crash in Waipawa after it was reported at 1pm Saturday. Photo / Alex Cairns
Rental car firm ordered to pay back money taken from client’s account without her knowledge https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rental-car-firm-ordered-to-pay-back-money-taken-from-clients-account-without-her-knowledge/CAY3L7UWFFGKBLAXYND4UAWF5I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rental-car-firm-ordered-to-pay-back-money-taken-from-clients-account-without-her-knowledge/CAY3L7UWFFGKBLAXYND4UAWF5I/ Tracy NealCompany claimed the door wouldn't open so took money off her credit card without asking. Sat, 04 May 2024 02:00:00 +0000 The Disputes Tribunal has found a woman couldn't have been responsible for damage to the side of a rental car — not shown above — when she was able to get out of the badly damaged driver's side. Stock Photo / 123RF
Mount Maunganui Bayfair mall alleged attack: Girl seen lying on ground in a pool of blood https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mount-maunganui-bayfair-mall-alleged-attack-girl-seen-lying-on-ground-in-a-pool-of-blood/3AP5LF5QRZARFFJZVFYQB45G5I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mount-maunganui-bayfair-mall-alleged-attack-girl-seen-lying-on-ground-in-a-pool-of-blood/3AP5LF5QRZARFFJZVFYQB45G5I/ A supermarket shopper has described shocking moment they realised someone was stabbed. Sat, 04 May 2024 01:21:24 +0000 Armed police officers were called to Bayfair shopping Centre in Mount Maunganui after an alleged assault.
Ōtaki head-on crash: Second person in stolen ute dies in hospital https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/otaki-head-on-crash-second-person-in-stolen-ute-dies-in-hospital/MLRGBLPJYNAGTILZOQ6PQSVQEM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/otaki-head-on-crash-second-person-in-stolen-ute-dies-in-hospital/MLRGBLPJYNAGTILZOQ6PQSVQEM/ Driver of the vehicle involved in the April 26 accident died on the scene. Sat, 04 May 2024 00:40:53 +0000 Just after 10.30pm April 26, a stolen ute wanted in connection with a robbery in Ōtaki earlier in the evening was signalled to stop by police just south of Levin. It collided head-on with another vehicle just south of Lawlors Rd at about 11.05pm. Photo / Bevan Conley

Mount Maunganui alleged assault: 16yo charged by police over Bayfair Shopping Centre incident https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mount-maunganui-assault-16yo-charged-by-police-over-bayfair-shopping-centre-incident/YL72BUTVDVEOJJMEHZKHPSJCFE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mount-maunganui-assault-16yo-charged-by-police-over-bayfair-shopping-centre-incident/YL72BUTVDVEOJJMEHZKHPSJCFE/ Police have arrested a teenage girl over the incident, attack victim remains stable.
